channel.title: Projects on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title: Collective Juice
item.description: Overview Demo Video Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build, Evaluate 10 / 2018 (4 weeks) Team Researcher(Me), Professor Harpreet Sareen Method / Technology Ideation from 1D to 5D Arduino, processing Output Physical prototype Objective How might we collect responses to questions that can only be answered by humans? As the development of technology, we can find many answers online within just a second.

item.title: MTA METROCARD REDESIGN
item.description: *This project is still ongoing Objective How might we make NYC’s subway riding experience more comfortable? The NYC metrocard system has remained unchanged for decades and users of NYC subway sometimes have uncomfortable experiences especially the entrance of subway; the lost time of waiting in line to buy a metrocard, touching a dirty machine and so on. User-centered service and experience is needed for users to get access easily to the metro, on time, without having a bad experience.

item.title: HUMAN EXPERIENCE FOR TRANSHUMAN
item.description: Concept XHuman: Educational Headset for transhumans to Experience “Human” in 2075 Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build Period* 10⁄2018 (2 weeks) Team / Role Researcher(Me), Professor Method Future Cone, Future’s Wheel, Timeline, Persona, Empathy Map, Storyboard, technological research Output* Physical prototype, User’s Manual Objective How can Humans and Transhumans coexist towards a sustainable society in 2075?

item.title: ORGANIC MUSIC VISUALIZER
item.description: Overview Demo Video Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build 10 / 2018 (1 Day) Team / Role Sole Project Maker, Coder Method / Technology Iterative coding html5, css3, javascript, three.js [Link] Demo is here --

item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: Objective After the deregulation, which direction should the electric power company aim for? In 2016, full-scale deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies have entered the electricity market. Chubu Electric Power Company (C-EPCO), a Japanese electricity utility provider for the mid-Chubu region of Honshu island, Japan, must shift to a new paradigm of customer service in order to improve its retention capability.

item.title: IBM WATSON COGNITIVE ENTERPRISE APP
item.description: Overview IBM Watson cognitive application We delivered an initial phase of a cognitive Watson Advisor solution using agile engineering approach. MHI engineers can inspect and take action for risks of their projects in advance without long industry experience. They reduced the time taken by the worker’s task by 30% as a result. Final UI gallery (click to zoom)

item.title: Future Supermarket 2020
item.description: Overview Demo Video As a facilitator of design thinking, our team designed a 2-days intensive design workshop and created a concept of supermarket of the next-generation. Our concept is that customers and their families can turn their household worries into fun and create their sustainable local communities together. In the last activity, we defined next To-Dos and achieved a consensus beyond all departments of Inageya. Finally, the client could go forward to a next step.

item.title: UBER UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN
item.description: Objective How can we improve the experience of Uber drivers? Joined 5 weeks MFA Interaction Design Program of User Research Methods in SVA, US. Woriking in teams, we’ve joined a real project with Uber and proposed UX to solve current issues. I’ve learned the fundamentals of user research techniques and the sense of UX in collaboration with global students. Teacher: Jodi Leo, VP of Product Design at CapTap

item.title: LimpiDual Touch
item.description: Overview Demo Video Project Information Phase / Period Concept, Design, Build, Evaluate 04/2007 - 03/2009 (2 years) Team / My Role Researcher: Masaki Iwabuchi Professor: Takeshi Naemura (Professor of the University of Tokyo) Method / Technology Technology Research, Iterative Prototyping Touch Interface, Non-Organic Transparent EL Display, OpenGL Output Research Paper, User Evaluation Sheet Inspiration What if we can display information on a transparent surface?
